record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - April 03, 2008)

[Page: S2588]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the following fellows and interns on the staff of the Finance Committee be allowed floor privileges during consideration of the Foreclosure Prevention Act: Ben Miller, Blake Thompson, Bridget Mallon, Damian Kudelka, Emily Schwartz, Ezana Teferra, Kayleigh Brown, Mary Baker, Tom Louthan, and Tyler Gamble.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, on behalf of Senator Landrieu, I ask unanimous consent that Dionne Thompson, a fellow in Senator Landrieu's office, be granted privileges of the floor during consideration of H.R. 3221 and for the duration.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
